description:
The AWS Serverless Application Model (SAM) is an open-source framework for building serverless applications.


Changes:
1edba25 - fix: add mount-with write for java25 tests (#8579)
17114df - chore(test): update skip condition for LMI test (#8562)
4f63f21 - feat: add --resolve-image-repos support to sam package (#8476)
27ba438 - Feat allow dict values in generate event cmd (#7938)
ab98052 - chore: update aws_lambda_builders to 1.62.0 (#8583)
c31bf5b - Fix LMI test skip condition and remove deprecated Python version (#8585)
cde14de - chore(deps-dev): bump psutil from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 in /requirements (#8577)
a36f148 - chore(deps): bump the types group in /requirements with 2 updates (#8580)
ac743e1 - chore(deps): bump tomlkit from 0.13.3 to 0.14.0 in /requirements (#8575)
5ed0599 - chore(deps): bump the boto group in /requirements with 2 updates (#8574)
265e102 - chore(deps): bump astral-sh/setup-uv from 5 to 7 (#8552)
002a787 - Fix grammar in log message for infra sync (#8589)
de04ccd - chore(deps): bump the boto group in /requirements with 2 updates (#8591)
890e7b8 - fix(zip): Add path validation (#8587)
75bc6c4 - chore: bump version to 1.153.0 (#8596)
411e183 - fix(unzip): replace UserException with ValueError exception in _extract() (#8599)

432734c - chore: bump version to 1.153.0 (#8601)
9c923df - chore: bump version to 1.153.1 (#8602)
